name: videoCall
description: ##### this web application is designed on node and react and functions on a single github page

scripts.install: npm i && cd app && npm i && cd .. && cd applicationServer && npm i && cd .. && cd video && npm i && cd server && npm i
scripts.tsinge-windows: concurrently "npm run servif" "npm run fronted-windows" "npm run vserif" "npm run vfronted"
scripts.tsinge-linuxmac: concurrently "npm run servif" "npm run fronted-linuxmac" "npm run vserif" "npm run vfronted"
